summary: The customer was provided with information about Contoso Wireless' internet plans, which include a basic plan with 10 Mbps download speed and 500 GB of data per month, and a premium plan with 100 Mbps download speed and 1 TB of data per month. The customer was also informed about additional features included with the plans, discounts and promotions available, and how to sign up online. Lastly, the customer was advised to read through the terms and conditions before making any commitments.
